title: Chriselle Lim
summary: Chriselle Lim (born 1984/1985) is an American fashion stylist, lifestyle and beauty blogger, digital influencer, and founder of The Chriselle Factor. Born in Texas, she has lived in Seoul. She currently lives in Los Angeles with her daughters. She has also walked down the runway in shows such as Rebecca Minkoff. She has travelled to Europe, Asia, New York, Los Angeles, and Miami for modelling. Having started out as a wardrobe stylist she has generated over 3 million social media followers.
